## setup
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

## read in tomato data
```{r}
tomatoes <- read.csv(here("Data/tomatoes.csv"))
```

## return 3rd, 7th, and 9th row
```{r}
slice(tomatoes, c(3, 7, 9))
```

## find all of the plants from the fertilizer treatment with avg_tomato_weight_g > or equal to 145 g
```{r}
tomatoes |>
  filter(Treatment == "Fertilizer" | Treatment == "fertilizer") |>
  filter(Avg_tomato_weight_g >= 145)
```
